scripts.setup: npm run clean && ./initialize.sh ${NETWORK:-futurenet} && npm run build-contracts && npm install
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.build-contracts: soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/soroban_oracle_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/oracle_id) --rpc-url $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/rpc-url) --network-passphrase "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/passphrase)" --output-dir ./.soroban/oracle-contract --contract-name oracle-contract          && soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/btc_token.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/btc_token_id) --rpc-url $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/rpc-url) --network-passphrase "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/passphrase)" --output-dir ./.soroban/btc-token --contract-name btc-token          && soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/donation_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/donation_id) --rpc-url $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/rpc-url) --network-passphrase "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/passphrase)" --output-dir ./.soroban/donation-contract --contract-name donation-contract
